TopicTitle: Planets rendered offset from their orbit

Articles.Content:
Hi guys, after installing ALL the mods (I am using "quite a few" of them), I am seeing this weird issue where the planets are rendered outside their orbits.
In fact, the whole tracking centre graphics seem to be off: see this [URL="http://imgur.com/3C3DJyo"]picture[/URL].

Has anybody seen anything like this before? Only the tracking centre is affected.
List of mods (plus 64k, which I installed manually): [URL]http://pastebin.com/8zBwpKRM[/URL]
It's because you are running KSP at a different resolution than you monitor. I just had this problem and had it fixed. Just make sure your resolutions match.
